landing_title: Unlock Your Math Potential with Edu-Track
landing_subtitle: Your personalized companion for interactive lessons, progress tracking, and AI-powered assistance. Ace your exams and build a strong foundation in mathematics.
landing_roles_subtitle: Edu-Track is designed to meet the unique needs of everyone in your educational institution. Find out how we can help you succeed.
role_student_desc: Engage with interactive lessons, take dynamic quizzes, and get instant help from our AI Math Assistant to master complex topics at your own pace.
role_teacher_desc: Easily create and manage quizzes, upload learning materials, monitor student progress in real-time, and communicate seamlessly with your classes.
role_admin_desc: Gain a high-level overview of school-wide performance with powerful analytics, manage user accounts, and ensure platform integrity with robust tools.
